column1: To go around the cedar trees
O'pen i' tse ngos chelanen sen
Chay' -le- sen o'pen i'tse nets'e slawen
I made eleven cat tail mats
Do you want some of the
I am going to go to work
I am going to go to work today.
I am speaking the Lummi language
What is his name? / What is her name? / What is it's name?
It is good to see you
Aa'a Su'itu' ey' kw-ens langnonget etie skwechil
Yes! it is good to see you this morning
I come from the survivors of the great flood
I come from the survivors of the great flood
